parameters.name: DatabaseId
parameters.description: The ID of the logical database.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ReturnGuid
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return the GUID of the table.

parameters.name: SearchName
parameters.description: The keyword that is used to search for the logical tables. Prefix match is supported.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> To view the tenant ID, move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner of the Data Management (DMS) console. For more information, see [Manage DMS tenants](~~181330~~).
